ygData.subject: Re: Karana what to hunt
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe... yup. I remember the feeling all too well. I was a lowbie in full leather armor, and didn t EVEN know there were hill giants on the map. He came up
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe... yup. I remember the feeling all too well. I was a lowbie in full
leather armor, and didn't EVEN know there were hill giants on the map. He came
up behind me, *WHAM* 85 damage, *wham* 75 damage (light hit), and *WHAM* 90+
damage ..... poof, respawn in qeynos.

Needless to say the first words to myself were, "mental note: hill giants in
east karanas."

-Faderic


"Mifsud, Michael" wrote:

> From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
> Wow took him 6 hits to kill me, and he missed 3 times :).
>
> > ----------
> > From: Kelly Pruett[SMTP:pruett@...]
> > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Sent: Saturday, May 22, 1999 3:34 AM
> > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Karana what to hunt
> >
> > From: Kelly Pruett <pruett@...>
> >
> >
> >
> > There is also an ogre camp on the northeast side of the map. About 3 to 5
> > ogres
> > of various sizes and classes. Probably random like the bandits. I did
> > encounter
> > one hill giant there once. He was crossing the small mountain between the
> > ogre
> > camp and a remote shop that I like to sell loot to. If I remember
> > correctly it
> > only took him three hits to pound me into the ground. The lesson here is
> > to be
> > careful out there....
> >
> > -Faderic
> >
